Reviews.Title: easy to use & very clear pictures
Reviews.Author: MLeCour
Reviews.Content: this is the nicest camera that i've ever owned. before i had a kodak easy share that i had bought at walmart for $80. the screen on this camera is large so it's easy to see the pictures you've taken. it's easy to use. the pictures it takes come out nice & it records as much video that you have space for with sound. i really like it.

Reviews.Title: A little big.
Reviews.Author: Shiwen Wang
Reviews.Content: It's much bigger than what I expected, also larger than a normal digital camera. It looks very nice and since it's 16MP, it can zoom in to take pictures of a very far away object with good quality.

ProductInfo.Features:
18x Zoom: Generous 18x zoom (equivalent to 25-450mm) with extra wide angle lens captures subjects near and far
16 megapixels: High resolution 16 megapixel sensor for large prints or aggressive image cropping
Slim footprint: Slim footprint for outstanding portability and inconspicuous use
Pentax Shake Reduction: Multiple Pentax Shake Reduction (SR) image stabilization options, including sensor-shift SR, for sharp images in any lighting
3 inch LCD: Large 3 inch LCD with HVGA resolution (460,000 dots)
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio RZ18 16MP Slim Digital Camera, 18x Zoom, 3 inch LCD Screen, Shake Reduction Image Stabilization, Face Detection, White
